name: GMTK 2020 - Haunted Thief
description:
A stealth game where you have no control over when you scream to alert guards or turn invisible to sneak past them. There's only really one level because I'm really bad at designing them and I ran out of time, but have fun!

Credits:

https://penusbmic.itch.io/ - Character assets

https://szadiart.itch.io/ - Castle Tileset
